meta.description: River decision scenarios for postflop training

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 頂對好踢腳，河牌 K 不改變太多。對手的 Ax 弱踢腳和 Kx 都會跟注。
scenarios.explanation_en: Top pair good kicker, river K doesn't change much. Opponent's weak Ax and Kx will call.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 擊中堅果順！河牌錯過同花聽牌，大注從兩對和頂對取值。
scenarios.explanation_en: Hit the nuts! River missed flush draws, large bet for value from two pair and top pair.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 頂 Set！對手跟注兩條街範圍很強，超池下注最大化價值。
scenarios.explanation_en: Top set! Opponent called two streets with strong range, overbet to maximize value.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 同花聽牌錯過，但有 A blocker 減少對手堅果。河牌 bluff 有阻擋效應。
scenarios.explanation_en: Missed flush draw but has A blocker reducing opponent's nuts. River bluff has blocking effect.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop c-bet, Turn barrel, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 連續兩次 barrel 被跟注，對手範圍強。76s 沒有 blocker 效應，放棄。
scenarios.explanation_en: Double barreled and got called, opponent range is strong. 76s has no blockers, give up.

scenarios.explanation_zh: TT 在這個牌面勝率有限。下注只會被更好的牌跟注，check 攤牌。
scenarios.explanation_en: TT has limited equity on this board. Betting only gets called by better, check to showdown.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 河牌擊中 Quads！超池下注從 Full House 和大兩對取最大價值。
scenarios.explanation_en: River hit Quads! Overbet to extract maximum value from Full House and big two pair.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 中 Set 但牌面危險。小額阻擋下注防止對手大 bluff，同時取一點價值。
scenarios.explanation_en: Middle set but board is scary. Small blocking bet prevents opponent's big bluff, while getting thin value.

scenarios.previous_action: Flop bet, Turn bet, both called
scenarios.explanation_zh: 河牌 A 是極好的 bluff 牌！代表 BTN 範圍的 Ax，對手的 Jx 很難跟注。
scenarios.explanation_en: River Ace is excellent bluff card! Represents Ax in BTN range, opponent's Jx can hardly call.

scenarios.explanation_zh: 河牌同花完成，As 是完美的 bluff blocker。Check-raise 代表同花或 Set。
scenarios.explanation_en: River completes flush, As is perfect bluff blocker. Check-raise represents flush or set.
